tool.name: Get homopolymer run length
tool.description: Annotate indel variants with homopolymer context
tool.command: ln -s '${reference}' ref.fa && samtools faidx ref.fa && python '${__tool_directory__}/get_hrun.py' --reference ref.fa --in-vcf '${in_vcf}' --out-vcf '${out_vcf}'
tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**What it does**
@WID@
**Inputs** - VCF file - Reference file for that VCF **Outputs** - VCF with annotated homopolymer run lengths for indels
